description.english: Have any Doggo grab a key and open a loot box on their own.
Dissolve 128 bodies with the dissolve spell.
Dispel a summoned building or golem 24 times.
Upgrade 6 houses to Reinforced High Occupancy Houses.
Kill a villager with a lightning bolt.
Have 512 villagers react to your actions.
Throw a nephalim into a Cullis Gate.
Upgrade the camp to completed castle.
Have villagers equip a bow 32 times.
Lose a villager due to fire damage.
Build 12 storage buildings of any kind.
Accidentally hit a villager with a meteor or comet.
Put aside all sense of decency, and toss a child into a Cullis Gate.
Have 16 Catjeet Nomads join the village.
Refine 128 logs or rocks into boards or cut stone.
Have 6 Catjeet die for any reason.
Kill a skeleton with piercing damage.
Drop a villager because you ran out of mana.
Force a lootbox to move 12 times.
Have or cause an earthquake during a blood moon.
Gather or generate a total of 4,096 energy in the village over time.
Burn 192 trash in a Trash Burner.
Have 12 Doggos die for any reason.
Upgrade 6 houses to Reinforced High Quality Houses.
Recall an injured villager while they are fleeing.
Carelessly toss a Doofy Doggo into a Cullis Gate.
Have a lightning rod misdirect your lightning bolt spell.
Sell at total of 24 god dust to Catjeet Provisioners.
Drop a comet on your camp or castle.
Uncover 12 keys or lootboxes from magic circles.
Buy or sell 256 resources to Catjeet Provisioners.
Buy 16 Suspicious Keys from Catjeet Provisioners.
Create 64 tools of any type at the Toolsmithy.
Create 64 armor of any type at the Armorsmithy.
Have 24 villagers die from old age.
Have 5 villagers or livestock turn into a zombie.
Harvest 1,024 of any resources from anywhere.
Get trash from a Loot Box.
Touch grass with your hand 16 times.
Have 24 villagers die for any reason.
Generate 256 flowers from magic and energy usage.
Drop a villager in a dangerous area.
Sacrifice a villager with a Cullis Gate.
Drop 64 resources into buildings with the grab spell.
Kill 16 enemies during a full moon.
